articles.author: Anu Sharma
articles.title: IndiGo launches flights to Africa, Central Asia with eye on US | Mint - Mint
articles.description: The airline said that the execution of this international expansion is an integral part in IndiGo’s strategy of moving across new frontiers under CEO, Pieter Elbers,
articles.content: Indias largest airline IndiGo has set its plan in motion to expand aggressively on international routes and will now fly to Africa and Central Asia with 174 new weekly flights between June and Septem… [+2749 chars]
